title: Windows XP Activation Pack 3 in 1
description:
Before Installing Windows XP write down a serial number from \"[Serial] CD Keys.txt\" unless you have alredy installed XP.

Use this number when the windows xp installer asks for the CD key. The codes provided have only been tested on Windows Media Center Edition 2005.

When you have installed XP, run \"[Crack] Activation Remover.exe\" to remove the 60 Day time trial. Now restart your PC.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/!\\ WARNING! Some virus scanners identify this crack as a Trojan Horse. I have used this crack many times and my computers are all fine.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Once restarted run \"[Crack] WGA Remover.reg\". This will make your computer immune to the Windows Genuine Advantage program that checks for cracked computers. 

YOU CAN NOW INSTALL UPDATES AND USE THE MICROSOFT WEBSITE WITHOUT WORRYING!

www.kttv.co.uk
